body.content:
My Dear  beloved friend ..

My name is Jamila Karl Heinz  from Abidjan but I live and go to school
in London. I am  an orphan. Due to the fact that I lost my parents and
only brother so early, after my scholarship approval to study medicine
in London; my dad was the managing director of Rice and Cocoa
manufacturing machinery exporter until his death.

He was assassinated years back, in the month of January by his
business associates that were envious of his program in the
organization, due to contract he won with the China and Thailand
government of production machines exportation for both countries.

Before his death he had truck consignment boxes which he left with the
security company,   while he told them that the boxes are content of
family valuables, He also up to 7.5 million British Pounds for
importation agreement of Rice and Cocoa processing machines, which is
all listered in his (WILL).

I get to know about this deposit through the assistance of a late
parent personal attorney  who gave me some documents under his care,
that's the reason I need your favor by receiving these funds to a safe
account and I will make my arrangement of visiting. I have plans to
invest in your country after my medical course.

Presently, I am reading medicine in England, with the British Medical
Association, and am 28 years old still single planning of getting
married after my final year exams next month, then I have my Diploma
to invest on my own clinic and orphanage homes, motherless babies,
refuges, charity homes etc.

I know you are willing to assist me, before contacting you, all I need
is your open communication, then I will introduce you to the
organization as my cousin or investor partner for the claim and
transfer processing to a safe account,

Upon yours response I will forward you my inherited (Document) and
(CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT and ownership certificate) for confirmation of
my message then we can go into an agreement of shear hold before
processing. Kindly let me know your heart desire over this mail for
more details and document for verification (No risk all legally okay)
Respond to my private email address ..jamilakarlheinz@outlook.com

Thanks for your understanding as I wait to hear from you soonest,
Remain bless.
Jamila Karl Heinz
